name: SCI-00002
notes: Acclimate case for ≥4 hours at 45–55% RH before opening.
Inspect wood and keywork; document pad/cork condition; upload photos.
Assemble dry; classify fits; log each joint.
14 days, 20–30 min/day; swab thoroughly after each use.
Light coat only; avoid pads; remove excess after rest.
Premium cork; sand to precise diameter; log measurements.
Float pads parallel; verify seal with feeler gauge.
Measure and adjust to A-clarinet targets.
Linked mechanisms close in perfect synchrony.
Map intonation tendencies across full range.
Compile logs, data, photos for client report.

task: Complete Final Documentation and Client Handover
notes: Ensure all logs, photos, and certificates are ready for client.
Gather feedback, assess performance, and identify improvements.

subject: Intake, Tagging & Baseline Photos
description: Tag instrument; verify customer notes; quick photos of current state; protect finish and posts.

subject: Baseline Leak-Light & Suction Check
description: Full leak-light sweep + gentle suction per stack to document starting leaks and guide work.

subject: Tenon Fit — Barrel ↔ Upper Joint
description: Inspect/true cork; correct high spots; ensure airtight fit, smooth rotation, zero wobble.

subject: Tenon Fit — Upper ↔ Lower Joint
description: Fit cork; verify axial alignment and bridge key clearances; ensure airtight seal.

subject: Tenon Fit — Lower Joint ↔ Bell
description: Fit and seal bell tenon cork; confirm bell resonance not damped by over-tight fit.

subject: Tone Hole Inspection & Micro-Repair — Upper Joint
description: Check for chips/divots/raised grain; micro-fill and burnish; re-true rims minimally.

subject: Tone Hole Inspection & Micro-Repair — Lower Joint
description: As above for lower joint; special attention to long B/F/E♭ holes.

subject: Minimal Corrective Reaming (As-Needed)
description: Only where required to restore a true rim. Avoid measurable vent diameter drift (>0.1 mm).

subject: Chimney Leak Detection & Seal
description: Dye test; wick thin sealant at chimney junctions; cure; light re-dress of rim; verify no leaks.

subject: Pad Leveling & Seating — Upper Joint
description: True cups; float/seat pads; heat-seat to uniform impression; verify full seal.

subject: Pad Leveling & Seating — Lower Joint
description: As above; coordinate linked closures (e.g., long B/F).

subject: Key Height (Vent) Adjustment — Throat & Side Keys
description: Set travel stops; verify even venting and twelfths; typical throat group 0.9–1.1 mm (model dependent).

subject: Key Height (Vent) Adjustment — RH Stack & Long Keys
description: Balance vent heights across RH stack; ensure long B/F linkage does not over-vent.

subject: Spring Tension Balance — Upper Joint
description: Gauge and match return forces for fast, even action with minimal finger load (~30–45 gf typical).

subject: Spring Tension Balance — Lower Joint
description: Balance long key return vs linkage friction; ensure positive close (~35–55 gf typical).

subject: Replace Register Cork with Beveled Cork
description: Select proper density; cut bevel for glide; cement, cure, and final dress to vent spec; silent closure.

subject: Re-Verify Pad Seat & Seal — Upper Joint
description: Leak-light + suction after height/spring/cork changes; correct any micro leaks.

subject: Re-Verify Pad Seat & Seal — Lower Joint
description: Leak-light + suction; correct micro leaks.

subject: Lubricate & Quiet Keywork
description: Oil pivots/rods sparingly; treat felts/corks; eliminate clicks; wipe excess.

subject: Final Leak Test (Assembled)
description: Full assembled leak-light and suction validation; correct any regression.

subject: Pitch & Response Check
description: Tune at A=440/442 per shop standard; verify twelfths; micro-adjust heights if needed.

subject: Final Play Test & Sign-Off
description: Scales, interval slurs, articulation pp–ff, side-key trills; sign QC.

subject: Sanitize, Clean, and Pack
description: Swab, sanitize mouthpiece, polish lightly; pack with care instructions.

subject: QC Photos & Worklog Update
description: After-photos; record measurements, notes, and advisories in worklog.

subject: Tone Hole Inspection & Micro-Repair — Upper Joint
Tone Hole Inspection & Micro-Repair — Lower Joint
Minimal Corrective Reaming (As-Needed)

Tone Hole Inspection & Micro-Repair — Lower Joint

subject: Chimney Leak Detection & Seal
depends_on_subjects: Tone Hole Inspection & Micro-Repair — Upper Joint
Tone Hole Inspection & Micro-Repair — Lower Joint
